I love to run.
My favorite city is new york.
My wife just left me.
I am a lawyer.

participant_2.background:
I just finished training as a security guard.
I recently broke up with my girlfriend.
I work nights now and like my job.
I have two dogs.
I m a 30 year old male.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1, how are you?
I'm doing alright, just finished training to be a security guard.
Oh cool! That's interesting. How do you like it so far?
It's alright, I'm still getting used to the night shifts but it's not too bad.
Yeah, I could imagine night shifts being tough. What made you want to become a security guard?
Well, I recently broke up with my girlfriend and I needed a job to keep myself busy. I've always been interested in law enforcement, so this seemed like a good fit.
I'm sorry to hear about your breakup. I hope you're doing okay.
Thanks, I'm managing. I'm just trying to keep busy and stay positive.
That's good. I'm sure you'll find someone better for you eventually.
Thanks, I hope so.
So, what are you doing for fun these days?
Not much, just hanging out with my dogs and running. I'm also trying to get into reading more.
That sounds like a good way to relax. I love running too. What are some of your favorite books?
I'm a big fan of Stephen King and John Grisham. I also like to read historical fiction and biographies.
Nice, I've read a few Stephen King books. I'm also a big fan of historical fiction.
Cool, maybe we can trade book recommendations sometime.
That would be great!
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a lawyer.
Oh, that's cool. What kind of law do you practice?
I'm a personal injury lawyer.
Oh, that's interesting. What's it like working in the legal field?
It's challenging, but it's also very rewarding. I like helping people and making a difference in their lives.
That's great. I'm glad you're happy with your job.
Thanks, I am.
